parts.text: {"word":"re-covering","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"再び覆う、再び覆いをする","english_definition":"to cover something again.","examples":[{"sentence":"She is re-covering the furniture with new fabric.","translation":"彼女は家具を新しい布で再び覆っている。"},{"sentence":"We are re-covering the pool for the winter.","translation":"冬に向けてプールを再び覆っている。"}],"collocations":["re-cover furniture (家具を再び覆う)","re-cover a pool (プールを再び覆う)","re-cover a book (本を再び覆う)"],"synonyms":["recover","recover","recoat","re-surface"],"antonyms":["uncover","expose","remove covering"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（紛失物など）を取り戻す、回復する","english_definition":""to get back something that was lost or taken; to regain or restore something.","examples":[{"sentence":"They are re-covering the stolen jewels.","translation":"彼らは盗まれた宝石を取り戻している。"},{"sentence":"The company is re-covering its losses.","translation":"会社は損失を回復している。"}],"collocations":["re-cover losses (損失を回復する)","re-cover stolen items (盗まれた物を取り戻す)","re-cover ground (失地を回復する)"],"synonyms":["recover","regain","retrieve","recoup"],"antonyms":["lose","forfeit","relinquish"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"再び覆うこと、再被覆","english_definition":"the act of covering something again.","examples":[{"sentence":"The re-covering of the chairs made them look new.","translation":"椅子の再被覆によって、椅子は新品のように見えた。"},{"sentence":"The cost of re-covering the roof was significant.","translation":"屋根の再被覆の費用はかなりのものだった。"}],"collocations":["furniture re-covering (家具の再被覆)","roof re-covering (屋根の再被覆)"],"synonyms":["recovering","recoating","resurfacing"],"antonyms":["uncovering","exposure","removal of covering"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「re-」+「covering」。「re-」は「再び」という意味の接頭辞。","priority":"★☆☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌriːˈkʌvərɪŋ/","syllables":"re-cov-er-ing"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["re-cover","re-covers"],"past_simple":"re-covered","past_participle":"re-covered","present_participle":"re-covering"},"noun_plural":"re-coverings"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「re-covering」は、動詞「re-cover」の現在分詞形または動名詞形です。動詞としては、「再び覆う」という意味と、「取り戻す、回復する」という意味があります。名詞としては、「再び覆うこと」を意味します。","priority":"★☆☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I am recovering the sofa. (意図: ソファを再び覆う)","correct":"✓ I am re-covering the sofa.","note":"「再び覆う」という意味では、「re-covering」とハイフンを付けることで意味を明確にすることが推奨されます。ただし、文脈によっては「recovering」でも意味が通じる場合があります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is re-covering from his illness. (意図: 病気から回復している)","correct":"✓ He is recovering from his illness.","note":"病気や怪我から回復するという意味では、「recovering」が正しいです。「re-covering」は使いません。"}],"priority":"★☆☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["re-cover (verb)","recover (verb)","covering (noun)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"★☆☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"低頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「Re-covering」は、何かを再び覆う行為、または失ったものを取り戻す行為を指します。この単語は、動詞「re-cover」の現在分詞または動名詞として使用されます。たとえば、家具を新しい生地で覆い直す場合や、損失を回復する場合に使用できます。この単語は、ハイフンを使用して「re-covering」と書かれることがあり、これは「recover」（回復する）という単語と区別するためです。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The craftsman is carefully re-covering the antique chair.","translation":"職人はアンティークの椅子を丁寧に再び覆っている。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"再び覆う"},{"sentence":"The company is focused on re-covering its market share.","translation":"会社は市場シェアを取り戻すことに注力している。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"取り戻す"},{"sentence":"The re-covering of the old books preserved them for future generations.","translation":"古い本を再び覆うことで、それらは将来の世代のために保存された。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"再び覆うこと"}]}
